name: Archio XML Model to Gemma OAS

mapping.name: name.#text
mapping.properties: {% if properties.property|default %}{% set uniqueIdKey = attribute(_context['@attributes'], 'identifier') %}{% if properties.property['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Model_Property_to_Gemma_OAS.json", properties.property|merge({'uniqueIdKey': uniqueIdKey}))|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Model_Property_to_Gemma_OAS.json", {'listInput': properties.property, 'uniqueIdKey': uniqueIdKey}, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
mapping.elements: {% if elements.element|default %}{% if elements.element['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Elements_to_Gemma_OAS.json", elements.element)|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Elements_to_Gemma_OAS.json", elements.element, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
mapping.relationships: {% if relationships.relationship|default %}{% if relationships.relationship['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Relations_to_Gemma_OAS.json", relationships.relationship)|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Relations_to_Gemma_OAS.json", relationships.relationship, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
mapping.organizations: {% if organizations.item|default %}{% if organizations.item.label|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Organization_to_Gemma_OAS.json", organizations.item)|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Organization_to_Gemma_OAS.json", organizations.item, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
mapping.propertyDefinitions: {% if propertyDefinitions.propertyDefinition|default %}{% if propertyDefinitions.propertyDefinition['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Property_Definition_to_Gemma_OAS.json", propertyDefinitions.propertyDefinition)|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Property_Definition_to_Gemma_OAS.json", propertyDefinitions.propertyDefinition, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
mapping.views: {% if views.diagrams.view|default %}{% if views.diagrams.view['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Views_to_Gemma_OAS.json", views.diagrams.view)|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Views_to_Gemma_OAS.json", views.diagrams.view, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
